proudly presents

New Year’s Blast on Fountain Square

December 31, 2016 @ 8PM

Sign Up. Show Up. Spread Cheer!

Sign up to use our app during the Huntington Bank New Year’s Blast on Fountain Square to engage in fun and games while ringing in the New Year. If you’d like to know more about The Iron Yard front-end web development graduates or our work, please join us on Demo Day to see what we’ve been up to.

Thank you for signing up – please check back often for updates!

Countdown to 2017
